name: Boho Breeze Maxi Dress
desc: Flowy maxi dress in earthy neutrals with tassels and floral prints — perfect for festivals and sundowners.

name: City Sprint Windbreaker
desc: Lightweight windbreaker with reflective trims and a sleek silhouette for night runs and streetwear layering.

name: Monochrome Power Blazer
desc: Sharp, structured blazer in deep black with minimalist lapels — boardroom-ready yet cocktail-chic.

name: Weekend Knit Set
desc: Soft ribbed knit top and joggers in warm oatmeal; lounge-friendly comfort that still looks put together.

name: Denim Revival Jacket
desc: Boxy mid-wash denim jacket with distressed seams and utility pockets for a lived-in, downtown feel.

name: Trailblazer Cargo Pants
desc: Tapered cargo pants with ripstop fabric and cinch hems — sturdy enough for trails, slick enough for cafes.

name: Silk Slip Moonlight
desc: Bias-cut silk slip in charcoal with a subtle sheen; pared-back elegance for evening layers.

name: Retro Court Sneakers
desc: Low-top leather sneakers with clean lines and vintage soles — versatile from brunch to late-night strolls.

name: Puffer Cloud Parka
desc: Oversized matte puffer with storm hood and high-loft insulation — warm without the bulk.

name: Art Gallery Trench
desc: Longline trench with crisp shoulders and belt; sculptural and modern for museum days and dinners.
